reviews.title: Welcoming B&B
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Martinborough Connection for one night whilst we were in Martinborough for a wedding. The hosts were very friendly and accommodating. The room was okay, although I would have liked a larger ensuite bathroom and somewhere to put my bag so it was not on the floor.

reviews.title: not really a boutique B = B
reviews.text: I agree with the previous reviewer that the property is close to the road and traffic noise was loud enough to be annoying, especially when young boy racers were accelerating up and down the street. Otherwise, it was fine for one night. The bed was comfortable and the breakfast filling.
